author: monkeyontheloose.eth
content: yeah that's the base fee, but the block gas limit also moves between blocks, miners get to adjust it the way they feel fit, and it also converges to 30M

author: monkeyontheloose.eth
content: it doesn't answer my question ser, but ok

author: pietjepuk
content: > As to why 30M, that is basically an arbitrary number that "felt right" to some unknown group of people in the past and these things are sticky.

author: chris2_2_2
content: A core dev tweeted 30M and we rolled with it
